Name: Feeding Frenzy
Description: Whenever an enemy would attack, it attacks twice instead.

Name: Hive Queen
Description:
The first enemy drawn each turn gains surge (including this, if applicable).

This enemy gets +X strength, where X is the number of enemies on the field.

Name: Walking Hive
Description: Each other enemy gets +2 to its strength.

Name: Spore Cloud
Description:
Heal 2 damage from each enemy.

Surge

Name: Hornet Swarm
Description: After an action deals damage to one or more enemies, this minion attacks.

Name: Mass of Maggots
Description: After the encounter deck surges, this minion attacks.
